options.initialComment:
=*BDR Candidate* – {{ $json['Candidate Name'] }}

*Experience*
*Total YOE:* {{ $json['Years of Experience'] }} year(s)
*Relevant YOE:* {{ $json['Relevant Years of Experience'] }} year(s)

*Trait Scores*
• *Coachability:* {{ $('Fields Mapping').item.json['Coachability Score'] }}/5
• *Curiosity:* {{ $('Fields Mapping').item.json['Curiosity Score'] }}/5
• *Prior Success:* {{ $('Fields Mapping').item.json['Prior Success Score'] }}/5
• *Intelligence:* {{ $('Fields Mapping').item.json['Intelligence Score'] }}/5
• *Work Ethic:* {{ $('Fields Mapping').item.json['Work Ethic Score'] }}/5
*Total Score:* {{ $json['Total Score'] }}/25

*Strengths:* {{ $json.Strengths }}
*Potential Concerns:*
{{ $('Fields Mapping').item.json['Potential Concerns'] }}

*Summary:*
{{ $('Fields Mapping').item.json.Summary }}

nodes.name: Upload and msg in Slack channel

parameters.text:
=You are an experienced in house recruiter screening candidates for a Business Development Representative role.

Evaluate objectively using only evidence from the resume at the URL provided: {{$json.webViewLink}}. Do not assume missing data.

Extract the following additional structured data:

age (if explicitly stated; otherwise return null)

highest_education_level using only one of:
"PhD", "Masters", "Degree", "Tertiary", "A level", "O level", "N level", "Primary School", or null

Education classification rules:

PhD includes doctorate titles

Masters includes MBA and MSc

Degree includes Bachelor programs

Tertiary includes diploma or polytechnic

Use highest completed level only

Now evaluate the candidate on five traits.

[Keep your existing trait definitions exactly as they are here.]

Calculate:

total_years_experience

relevant_years_experience for a BDR role only

[Keep your existing inclusion and exclusion logic.]

Round years to nearest 0.5.

For each trait:

Assign score 1 to 5

Provide one short evidence quote

Scoring guidance:
1 = No clear evidence
3 = Some evidence
5 = Strong and repeated measurable evidence

Return STRICT JSON only.
No markdown.
No extra text.

Use this exact structure:

{
"candidate_name": "",
"email": "",
"age": null,
"highest_education_level": "",
"total_years_experience": 0,
"relevant_years_experience": 0,
"traits": {
"coachability": { "score": 0, "evidence": "" },
"curiosity": { "score": 0, "evidence": "" },
"prior_success": { "score": 0, "evidence": "" },
"intelligence": { "score": 0, "evidence": "" },
"work_ethic": { "score": 0, "evidence": "" }
},
"total_score": 0,
"strengths": "",
"potential_concerns": "",
"recruiter_summary": ""
}

Constraints:

strengths: max 20 words, comma separated

potential_concerns: max 15 words, comma separated

recruiter_summary: max 30 words

Include a new field:

"resume_url": "{{$json.webViewLink}}"

Return STRICT JSON only. No markdown. No extra text.

main.node: Upload and msg in Slack channel
